meta.project: GymOS MX - Mexican Gym Management Platform
meta.positioning: AI-powered gym management with Mexican compliance

brand_names.name: FitTrack
brand_names.rationale: Combines 'Fit' (universal fitness term) with 'Track' (monitoring/analytics). Easy to pronounce in Spanish, no negative connotations.

brand_names.name: GymFlow
brand_names.rationale: Suggests smooth operations and workflow management. 'Flow' translates well to Spanish concept of flujo.

brand_names.name: Fitero
brand_names.rationale: Spanish-sounding name combining 'Fit' with Spanish suffix '-ero' (like 'compa√±ero'). Natural for Mexican speakers.

brand_names.name: Gimnex
brand_names.rationale: Combines 'Gimn' (from gimnasio) with 'ex' (excellence/experience). Tech-sounding with Spanish roots.

brand_names.name: Pulso
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'pulse' - suggests vitality, monitoring, and life. Short, memorable, perfect pronunciation.

brand_names.name: Nexfit
brand_names.rationale: Combines 'Next' concept with 'Fit'. Suggests next-generation fitness technology. Easy to pronounce.

brand_names.name: Vitalis
brand_names.rationale: Latin-derived name meaning 'vital/life force'. Sophisticated, easy to pronounce in Spanish, suggests health and vitality.

brand_names.name: Forza
brand_names.rationale: Italian/Spanish word meaning 'strength/force'. Short, powerful, easy to remember and pronounce.

brand_names.name: Activo
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'active'. Perfect fit for fitness industry, natural pronunciation, positive connotations.

brand_names.name: Zenfit
brand_names.rationale: Combines 'Zen' (balance/mindfulness) with 'Fit'. Suggests holistic approach to fitness management.

brand_names.name: Impulso
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'impulse/drive'. Suggests motivation and forward movement. Natural for Spanish speakers.

brand_names.name: Flexo
brand_names.rationale: Short, catchy name suggesting flexibility and adaptability. Easy to pronounce, tech-friendly sound.

brand_names.name: Ritmo
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'rhythm'. Suggests consistency, flow, and musical connection to fitness.

brand_names.name: Dynamo
brand_names.rationale: Suggests energy, power, and dynamic movement. International recognition with Spanish pronunciation.

brand_names.name: Elevate
brand_names.rationale: English word meaning 'to lift up'. Suggests improvement and growth. Moderate pronunciation difficulty in Spanish.

brand_names.name: GoGym
brand_names.rationale: Action-oriented name meaning 'go to the gym'. Perfect pronunciation, strong fitness association, memorable and motivational.

brand_names.name: Motiva
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'motivate'. Suggests inspiration and drive. Natural for Spanish speakers.

brand_names.name: Fuerza
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'strength/force'. Perfect fitness association, natural pronunciation, powerful meaning.

brand_names.name: Optimo
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'optimal'. Suggests best performance and efficiency. Tech-friendly sound.

brand_names.name: Energia
brand_names.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'energy'. Perfect fitness association, natural pronunciation, positive connotations.

top_5_recommendations.name: Vigor
top_5_recommendations.rationale: Highest scoring name with perfect pronunciation, strong fitness association, and memorable 5-letter length. Works in both Spanish and English markets.

top_5_recommendations.name: Fuerza
top_5_recommendations.rationale: Tied for highest score. Pure Spanish word meaning 'strength' - perfect category fit and natural for Mexican market. Strong brand positioning potential.

top_5_recommendations.name: FitTrack
top_5_recommendations.rationale: Strong tech positioning with clear fitness connection. Easy to pronounce and remember. Good for international expansion.

top_5_recommendations.name: Fitero
top_5_recommendations.rationale: Unique invented name with Spanish feel. Excellent domain availability prospects and low trademark risk. Distinctive in market.

top_5_recommendations.name: Ritmo
top_5_recommendations.rationale: Spanish word meaning 'rhythm' - suggests consistency and flow. Short, memorable, and perfect pronunciation for Mexican market.

availability_check_methodology: Domain availability assessed through general market knowledge and common patterns. Actual availability requires real-time DNS lookup and registrar verification. Social handle availability estimated based on naming patterns and platform conventions.
trademark_disclaimer: Trademark risk assessment is preliminary and based on general knowledge. Professional trademark search and legal consultation required before final selection.
recommended_next_steps: Conduct real-time domain availability checks for top 5 names
Perform comprehensive trademark searches in Mexico and key markets
Test pronunciation and memorability with Mexican focus groups
Verify social media handle availability across all platforms
Assess cultural connotations and potential negative associations
